thread.title: Bridget Moynahan got married - Celebrity news
thread.title_full: Bridget Moynahan got married - Celebrity news

author: boston.com
title: Bridget Moynahan got married - Celebrity news
text:
Oh, by the way, guess what I just did @johndolanphotog #sohappy #perfection #friends #family #forever
A photo posted by Bridget Moynahan (@bridgetmoynahan) on Oct 17, 2015 at 5:36pm PDT
Massachusetts-bred actress and model Bridget Moynahan shared some exciting news on Instagram Sunday: she got married.
Moynahan—former girlfriend of Tom Brady, and mother of his son Jack—tied the knot with New York businessman Andrew Frankel in the Hamptons Saturday at an “intimate ceremony,” People.com reports .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Frankel is a New York native, and co-president of Stuart Frankel and Co., a firm on Wall Street. Moynahan posted photos from her day on Instagram, one of which captured herself and Frankel holding hands. “Oh, by the way, guess what I just did,” the caption read.
A “source” also told People.com, “Bridget’s son Jack [with ex Tom Brady] is excited to be gaining three incredible older brothers.”
I love you Dad #perfection #proud #priceless @johndolanphotog
A photo posted by Bridget Moynahan (@bridgetmoynahan) on Oct 18, 2015 at 3:36pm PDT
